channel.title: Errors with Global Objects
channel.description:
When i add new global objects now i get this error:[code]Copy of client.java:12: class client is public, should be declared in a file nam ed client.java public class client extends Player implements Runnable { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
and to be onest it is making me very angry..how do i declare it in a file nameed client.java or w.e i need to do please post on howi sould declare, or slove this problem, thankz
